channel.title: Lins Interface Editor | Help
channel.description:
Well in the older version it had an option where you could move a sprite or text around in different places (x, y) with this option: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2rqbrph.png[/img]
But the updated version doesn't have those options: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2dvsx11.png[/img]
Does anyone know how to move something around with the newer version? Sorry if i'm confusing you, but I can't really think of another way to explain this.
